page.title: 05NEWHAVEN TOWN COUNCIL'S WORK
page.content:
Newhaven Town Council consists of 16 elected members, under the chairman- ship of the town Mayor. The mayor for 1985/86 is Mrs. Temple. The paid town clerk is Mr. Rothwell. The town has close links with Dieppe. Last year the local rate was maintained at a low level, ie #5 per head. The public are welcome to attend Committee meetings but can only ask questions at Council meetings and the annual meeting in May.
The Council met on ten occasions in the past year, and gave grants to British Red Cross, Downs Hospital, Denton and South Heighton junior football club, Seahaven Pool, Busy Bees playgroup, Denton kindergarten, Newhaven Dramatic Society and Searchlight Workshops.
